title: vaiyam aLandu vAnaLanda
sahitya:
vaiyam aLandu vAnaLanda mAdhavA varadAbhya karam tarum karumuhil varNA


ScaraNam    seyyat-tAmarai shIraDi koNDu shIriya kALiyan mElADiyadu kaNDu 
uyyat-tAnAshai koNDu uLLam kaNDu urimai pera tAnumADiyadu uNDu 
ulagIrEzhaiyum uNDu uLa mAyaiyara darishanam adu tarum 
				(jati)
